scripts.dev:web: docker-compose up -d && concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev -w @just-recordings/api" "npm run dev -w @just-recordings/web"
scripts.dev:desktop: docker-compose up -d && concurrently -n api,desktop -c blue,yellow "npm run dev -w @just-recordings/api" "npm run dev -w @just-recordings/desktop"
scripts.dev:all: docker-compose up -d && concurrently -n api,web,desktop -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev -w @just-recordings/api" "npm run dev -w @just-recordings/web" "npm run dev -w @just-recordings/desktop"
scripts.build:desktop: npm run build -w @just-recordings/web && npm run build -w @just-recordings/desktop
scripts.build:heroku: npm run build -w @just-recordings/shared && npm run build -w @just-recordings/web && npm run build -w @just-recordings/api
scripts.test:watch: concurrently -n api,desktop,recorder,shared,web -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan "npm run test:watch -w @just-recordings/api" "npm run test:watch -w @just-recordings/desktop" "npm run test:watch -w @just-recordings/recorder" "npm run test:watch -w @just-recordings/shared" "npm run test:watch -w @just-recordings/web"
